about_the_game:
BASH SOME SKULLS

Fight your way through the armies of the undead, in this retro-styled romp that plays in both 3D and 2D! Explore levels in 2D as the heroes of legend, and then do them in 3D as the hammer princess!

Inspired by boomer shooters of the 90s, and 2D platformers of the 80s, this brand new twist on a classic formula sees you playing as both the heroes rescuing the princess, and the princess escaping by herself!

IN 3D...

  • Dash, float and fight your way through the lands of the undead, in exciting first-person action levels.

  • Defeat your enemies using your trusty, life-leeching Hammer! Swing it, throw it, crush foes, walls and furniture alike.

  • Meet with the souls of fallen heroes, learn from their deaths, and add their weapons to your arsenal.

  • Escape this wicked kingdom, and rise as a legend!

... AND 2D

  • Revisit the past, in classical platformer style, as you live the story of the fallen heroes and how they came to an end.

  • Play with each heroes' weapons and abilities, as you master the tools that you'll later use in 3D!

  • Battle the undead in a whole new dimension! Experience the same enemies and bosses in both gameplay formats, and use what you learn in one to succeed in the other!

  • Learn from the mistakes of the past, in order to rise above, and defeat the Monarch of the Skulls once and for all!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hammer Princess Team is:

Facundo Nahuel Colombo

Facundo Ignacio Gonzalez Gimenez

Rodrigo León Magariños

Carolina Luciana Cándido

Santiago Roque D'Angelo

Hammer Princess Team is NOT a legal entity, it is our current team name.

name: Escape Of The Hammer Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G with Radeon Vega 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Subject To Change

short_description: A retro-styled rampage in both 3D and 2D! Bash some Skulls, Break Stuff, and Rise as a Legend!
